reviews.review: Haha physics go Bye bye and ZOOM at the same time!

Excellent game, nothing more needs said.
игра для людей у которых хорошо развита логическая логика.
ну портал и портал и что

This game is soooooooo.ooooooo good! The zeros represent how many hours I have on this game! (At time of writing this) The story, A perfectly designed villian. Please if you haven't played Portal or Portal 2 GET THE GAMES. Also once you finished the game there is a Co-op with is so epic. So please get the game its a gaming experience witch you won't forget.
Прекрасная игра сделанная в 2011 году выглядит лучше некоторых игр 2021
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei
best single player story driven game of all time.

Therapy is expensive
Being called "Luv" by Wheatley is way cheaper
One of the most enjoyable games i've ever played.
Recomendo muito o jogo tem compatibilidade para mods, uma historia boa, e voce pode criar seus proprios levels fazer test, e desvendar puzzles
Definitiv eins der besten Spiele, wenn man mal so richtig nachdenken möchte. Bietet sehr vielfältige Möglichkeiten dank Coop-Multiplayer und der Möglichkeit, im Editor eigene Level zu erstellen.
Obra maestra secuela de otra obra maestra con conceptos de puzzles nuevos y muy originales. A partir de la mitad del juego se hace un poco pesadito y repetitivo pero nada alarmante. Es un juegazo.
小时候有次CSGO打折想买，发现CSGO和传送门一起买居然更便宜，当时觉得V社不是撒币吗。后来有空玩了才意识到有好游戏还晾在库里的我才是撒币。
很好，是游戏工作者的一个好的建议。如何以简单的游戏机制辅以其他的工具来让游戏变得活跃有趣。简洁而又美丽，如同麦克斯韦电磁方程一般对于物理学。
funny game puzlin but its one of the best
Overall a great game. Deserves a play through from anyone. Fun game play, enjoyable story, and always a good laugh.
11/10 one of the best games I have played
尽量别查攻略，哎，成就感少了好多
Игра замечательная ! Но после обновления на Mac os Catalina перестала работать. Можете пожалуйста сделать обновления на Mac с 64 битвой системой. Я ВАС УМОЛЯЮ !
I've beaten the game a few times and it is worth the money even after all these years 10/10

A game where computers become potatoes and then have PTSD of lemons
Era obvio, la 2da parte siempre es mejor que la anterior; lo mismo, pero mucho mejor, esta mejor desarrollado, mejor inteligencia artificial, mejor ambiente, totalmente recomendado.
绝对是神作，如果你厌倦打打杀杀，想在游戏体验科学与艺术美感，凭借自己的智力完成一个个有趣的谜题，那么这款游戏适合你。在这里催催G胖数三

honestly one of the best games i've ever played
This Game is Epic, At first play i always wanted this game, In total i played 82 hours on this game!

Absolutely love this game. It extended the original Portal into a longer sequel. The first Portal just seemed more experimental than actually trying to be as long as other games Valve makes such as Half-Life 2. The puzzles in this aren't extremely challenging, but still makes you think, and the more puzzles you complete the more you advance in the story. Games like this make me wish Valve still made games like they used to.
